thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Johnson & Johnson Raises Sales Outlook

author: Imani Moise
title: Johnson & Johnson Raises Sales Outlook

organizations.name: johnson & johnson raises sales outlook johnson & johnson

text:
Johnson & Johnson reported higher-than-expected sales in its latest quarter and boosted its sales outlook for the year despite ongoing pricing pressures in the drug industry.
Shares rose 0.7% to $132.75 during premarket trading as J&J, one of the biggest sellers of prescription drugs in the U.S., also beat analystsâ€™ profit expectations.
